message.p: Problem Objective: This task gives tutoring on fraction addition where the denominators of both the fractions are same. (eg: 1/3 + 4/3)

The page has a total of six input boxes. There are also labels indicating what each input box is meant for. The first two vertical boxes are for entering the numerator and denominator of the first fraction. The second two vertical boxes are for entering the numerator and denominator of the second fraction. The third two vertical boxes are for entering the numerator sum and denominator sum obtained by adding the two input fractions.
You can ask for a hint by clicking the "Hint" button any time during the task for getting help. You can also check if you are done with the task or not any time by clicking on the "Done" button.
